Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud
texts.en:
The 'Las Misioneras' (The Missionaries) community bank is just about to start its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Cascada regional office.  The group has 12 members and its president is Ana.  The ladies all have different businesses which include sales, production and services.

Ana, the president of the community bank, tells us that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer.  She joined the institution as she was invited by her fellow group members from 'Las Misioneras'.

Ana currently has a business spinning vicuna wool.  She also makes blankets.  Ana tells us that she learned this business from her sister-in-law 18 years ago.

Ana will use the loan that she is requesting to increase her capital and buy more wool.  She will buy her wool in the 16 de Julio street market (a commercial area in the city of El Alto) and then sell it on credit.

This work allows Ana to make money with which to support her family.  She lives with her partner and has three children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer she replied that she likes the health program.

loans.use: to increase her supplies for spinning vicuna wool and knitting blankets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her studies

loans.name: Ciro

texts.es:
Ciro nació en la ciudad del Paruro y tiene 47 años de edad. Actualmente, Ciro vive en misma ciudad donde nació, él es un padre trabajador que saca adelante a sus tres hijos, él brida servicio de transporte en su propio carro en la ruta de las ciudades del Cusco hacia Paruro y viceversa.  Ciro en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. El sueño de Ciro es la comprar otro carro para igual brindar servicio de transporte. 

Ciro es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Ciro is 47 years old and was born in the city of Paruro.  He currently lives in the same city in which he was born.  Ciro is a hard-working father who works to get his three children ahead in life.

Ciro provides a transport service in a car that he owns on a route which runs between the cities of Cusco and Paruro.  On this occasion he requires a loan to have some maintenance work done on his car.  Ciro's dream is to buy another car which he can use to offer a transport service.

Ciro is a responsible person who belongs to Asociación Arariwa's 'Puntualito' community bank which is located in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to have maintenance work done on his car

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is a 47-year-old married woman with four children. The oldest child is 25 years old.

Elma owns a business making toilet bowls. She has had this business for four years. She earns about 3000 PHP per month. She plans to use her loan to purchase additional materials for making toilet bowls.

Elma works hard to support her family. She hopes for her business to grow.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making toilet bowls

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cereal

loans.name: El Camino Del Exito Group

texts.es:
Juana, 35 años D. edad, casada, 01 hijo; presidenta D. L. alcancìa comunal: "El Camino del Exito".
Juana vive en el distrito D. Mejorada, provincia D. Huancavelica, y se dedica a L. venta D. comida y da pensiòn a trabajadores D. L. zona. Su negocio està ubicado en una zona cèntrica; adicionalmente venD. frutas y golosinas.
Juana tiene el hàbito del ahorro, y con ello màs el crèdito otorgado se comprò una refrigeradora que necesitaba tanto para su restautante.
En L. fotografìa Juana esta vestida con chaleco color gris y esta en el centro D. todos los socios; y L. fotografìa fuè tomada en L. puerta D. su negocio.
L. foto pequeña D. L. parte superior derecha pertenece a Elizabeth I., quièn no pudo asistir por tener que atender su negocio que tambièn es D. comida y da pensiòn.
L. socia que no se encuentra en L. fotografìa es: Aracelli SobrevilL., y no fue a L. reuniòn por estar un poco delicada D. salud.
texts.en:
Juana is 35 years old, married, and has one child.  She is the president of the 'El Camino del Éxito' (The Road to Success) community bank.

Juana lives in Mejorada district, in Huancavelica province.  Her business is selling meals and running a restaurant, catering to workers in the area.  Juana's business is located in a central area.  She also sells fruit and candy.

Juana is in the habit of saving and she put together some of her savings with the loan she was granted in order to buy a refrigerator that she badly needed for her restaurant.

In the photograph, Juana is wearing a grey body warmer and is in the middle of all the other members.  The photograph was taken in the doorway of her business.  The small photo in the top right-hand corner belongs to Elizabeth I. who couldn't attend because she had to work in her restaurant business.

The member who is absent from the photo is Aracelli SobrevilL..  She didn't attend the meeting because she was feeling unwell.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Zafiross Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “ ZAFIROSS”,  ubicado en el estado de México. Está integrado por 10 personas, en este grupo se encuentra la señora ANABEL R. A. de 42 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos de 14, 15 Y 18 años, ella comenta que estudió hasta la secundaria y  hace aproximadamente 7 años decidió poner su negocio de PAPELERÍA que inició en la casa de sus padres, este negocio le ayuda a apoyar el gasto familiar. Sus planes a futuro son abrir un negocio de CIBER CAFÉ y terminar la construcción de su casa.  Desea el préstamo para invertir en mercancía para el negocio y así poder contribuir en mejorar la calidad de vida de sus seres queridos, así como brindarles educación y una carrera profesional a sus hijos para que logren sus sueños.
texts.en: The ZAFIROSS community bank is located in the state of Mexico.  The bank's 10 members include ANABEL R. A..  Anabel, 42, has 3 children who are 14-, 15- and 18-years old, respectively.  She tells us that she studied up to high school level.  She decided to set up a PAPELERIA--a paper supply store--in her parent's house, 7 years ago, to help with family expenses.  Her future projects include setting up a CIBER CAFE and finishing construction on her house.  She will use this loan to buy merchandise for her retail business, a business that she expects to contribute to improving her and her family's quality of life.  She wants to provide good educations for her children because she dreams of seeing them all in well-paid careers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for retail business

loans.name: Joas

texts.en: Joas is a businessman who runs a taxi business. Apart from the taxi business, he supplies soda and water for extra income. He has been in the business for three years and has two employees. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He has been guaranteed a loan of 50,000 Kes by his group members in Faulu Kenya. He will use the loan to buy soda, water and a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy soda, water and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa nació en la ciudad del Acomayo del departamento del Cusco y tiene 47 años de edad. Actualmente, Teresa vive en la encantadora ciudad del Cusco donde la gente es amigable y carismática, ella es una mujer trabajadora que saca adelante a sus tres hijos, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, ella nos cuenta que desde muy joven se dedica a este negocio y le ha ido muy bien. Teresa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, gaseosas, cerveza, fideos y otras cosas más. El sueño de Teresa es la abrir un depósito de cerveza para vender las 24 horas del día.  

Teresa es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Teresa, 47, was born in Acomayo in Peru's "departamento" of Cusco.  She now lives in the city of Cusco, a charming city of friendly, charasmatic people.  Teresa is a hard-working woman striving to support her three children.  She has a small corner shop that she runs from her house.  She sells everyday commodities.  She tells us that she knows the business well, having worked at it since she was very young.  Teresa will use this loan to buy merchandise--rice, sugar, soft drinks, beer and pasta, for example--that she will resell.  Her long-term goal is to open a store that is licensed to sell beer 24 hours a day.  

Teresa is a responsible woman.  She's a member of the Puntualito community bank, a group sponsored by Cusco's Asociacion Arariwa bank.

loans.use: to stock grocery items for resale

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en: Mildred is a 31-year-old member of Faulu Kenya. She sells cereal and vegetables for a living. She also works as a secretary. She has been running her business for two years and employs one person. She is thankful to Faulu Kenya for helping her improve her business through access to loans. She hopes to expand her business premises in the future. With 58,000 Kes, she will add to her stock of cereal.

loans.use: to add to her stock of cereals

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia nació en la histórica ciudad del Cusco y tiene 41 años de edad. Actualmente, Eusebia vive en la misma ciudad donde nació donde la gente es amigable y alegre, ella es una mujer trabajadora que saca adelante a sus cuatro hijos, ella trabaja en el INPE (Institución de Penitenciaria del Cusco) y está encargada de la seguridad de los reclusos. Ya son 10 años que trabaja en la institución y le ha ido muy bien.  Eusebia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para abrir una tienda para vender ropa tanto para caballeros, damas y niños. 

Eusebia es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Eusebia, 41, was born in the historic city of Cusco.  She still lives in that charming city of friendly, charasmatic people.  Eusebia works hard, striving to support her four children and get ahead in the world.  She works for INPE--the Spanish initials for Peru's prison-management organization--with responsibility for prisoner security.  She has worked for INPE for 10 years and is glad to have the job.  Eusebia is applying for a loan because she wants to open a clothing store where she will sell clothing for men, women and children.

Eusebia is a responsible woman.  She's a member of the Puntualito community bank, a group sponsored by Cusco's Asociacion Arariwa bank.

loans.use: to open a clothing store

loans.name: Monica Isabel

texts.es: Mónica  L. B.  es una mujer de 30 Años, que vive en  el Municipio de San  Jacinto, departamento de Bolívar, lugar donde la  tradición artesanal de sus pobladores es muy reconocida en Colombia, especialmente en lo relacionado con el tejido vertical ; como Mónica no se podía quedar atrás, ella  también está salvaguardando esta tradición, por eso está dedicada a la producción de mochilas y bolsos que elabora con sus propias manos;  además  de generar otros ingresos en la preparación y  venta  de Boli (jugos de frutas naturales congelados),  paleta y por temporadas trabajar como auxiliar de un fotógrafo. Mónica vive con su cónyuge, que labora en una emisora local  y  con su hijo  de 7 años de edad, con éste   tiene sus máximos sueños y es el de convertirlo en un profesional exitoso y bien preparado para la vida.  Este es su segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el anterior logró hacer ahorros para mejorar su vivienda y aumentó ligeramente los ingresos de su hogar. Con su credikiva invertirá una parte en hilos, hilazas y accesorios para elaborar mochilas encargadas y la otra parte la invertirá en adecuaciones al piso de su vivienda que no está en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Mónica L. B. is 30 years old and lives in the municipality of San Jacinto in the Bolívar department. The region is well known in Colombia for its traditional textiles and vertical weaving, a method of weaving on vertical strands of thread on an upright loom. Mónica is keeping this tradition alive by making handmade backpacks and bags. She generates additional income by preparing and selling Boli (frozen natural fruit juices) and popsicles, and occasionally works as a photographer's assistant. 

Mónica lives with her husband, who works at a local radio station, and their 7-year-old son. She has high hopes that her son will have a successful career and a comfortable life. 

This is Mónica's second loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With the previous loan, she was able to save money for home improvements and to slightly increase her household income. She plans to invest part of this loan from Kiva in thread, yarn, and accessories for completing backpack orders, and the rest of the loan in repairing the floor of her home, which is in poor condition.

loans.use: To invest in thread, yarn, and accessories to make backpacks, as well as to repair floors of home.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “EMPRENDEDORAS” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y tiene como presidenta a la señora María.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Hilado de vicuña y venta, confección de polleras, confección de prendas, venta de pescado, venta de CD’s, venta de blusas, tienda de barrio.

La señora María, presidenta de la asociación comunal, indica que es su el segundo ciclo con  Pro Mujer. En la actualidad la señora María tiene un negocio de confección de prendas y con el crédito que sacará ahora será para la compra de tela. Estos productos los vende en la calle Larecaja de lunes a sábado.

En la foto podemos ver que falta una de las socias, ella es la señora Flora, que conto que estaba apresurada para abrir su negocio
texts.en:
The "Emprendedoras" ("Entrepreneurs") communal bank will begin its second cycle with Pro Mujer, part of the Centro Focal de Panamericana. It has eight members and is presided by Maria. The members of the association run a variety of business, including: making and selling vicuna yarn, making skirts, making clothes, selling fish, selling CDs, selling shirts and a convenience store.

Maria, president of the association, explains that this is her second cycle with Pro Mujer. Maria currently owns a clothes making business and with the loan she will buy fabric. She sells her products from Monday to Saturday in Larecaja street.  

In the picture we can see that Flora, one of the members, is missing. She had to leave in a rush to open her business.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en: Sara is a businesswoman who does tailoring. She has been in the business for six years and employs one person to assist her. She has an additional job besides her tailoring business. Her previous loan from Faulu Kenya enabled her to boost her business. She hopes to fully establish her business within five years. She has requested 40,000 Kes to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel tiene 64 años, es una mujer servicial y atenta. Es divorciada, tiene 3 hijos, pero sólo vive con una de sus hijas y su yerno. Desde hace 17 años, se dedica a su negocio en su casa, en la venta de productos perecibles y dulces en general. El negocio que realiza le gusta mucho, porque se mantiene muy ocupada y entretenida, de esa manera olvida de la enfermedad que padece, que es la diabetes. Pero a pesar de no tener presupuesto se las ingenia y compra sólo por docenas los productos que vende, de ese modo logra proveerse de mayor diversidad de productos para su tienda, cumpliendo con la demanda de sus clientes. Es por eso que desea abastecerse de más mercadería y, con el tiempo piensa modificar las rejas de su tienda, para ganar mayor espacio en su local, así podrá vender otros productos como útiles escolares y luego ofrecer el servicio de fotocopias por lo que planea comprarse una fotocopiadora y trabajar en sociedad con su hija. Es su 16avo crédito que tiene con MFP, y como líder de su grupo, agradece a todos ustedes por los reiterados apoyos que recibió y se compromete en pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente. De obtener el crédito que solicita, comprará los productos perecibles que le hacen falta, para tener siempre atractiva su negocio.
texts.en:
Isabel is 64 years old. She is a helpful and attentive woman. She is divorced with three children, but she only lives with one of her daughters and her son-in-law. 

For the last 17 years she has been dedicated to her store, which she runs from home. She sells perishable goods and all sorts of sweets. She loves her business because it keeps her very busy and entertained and takes her mind off diabetes, an illness she suffers from. Despite having no budget, she manages to buy the goods she sells by the dozen,  so that she can have a great variety of products in her store, which is what her clients demand. That's why she'd like to stock more products for her shop. Eventually she also plans to modify the window bars in her store to increase the space available in her premises so as to be able to sell other products such as school supplies and provide a photocopying service. She is planning to purchase a photocopier and work in partnership with her daughter. 

This is her 16th loan with MFP. As leader of her group, she would like to thank everyone for the support repeatedly received and is committed to repaying back her loan. If she obtains the loan requested she will buy the perishable goods she needs to keep her business running.

loans.use: to buy perishable products.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio nació en la histórica ciudad del Cusco y tiene 42 años de edad. Actualmente, Antonio vive en la misma ciudad donde nació donde la gente es amigable y alegre, él es una padre trabajador que saca adelante a sus tres hijos, él trabaja en una agencia de viajes de turismo y está encargado de recoger a los turismo, da información acerca de la tuor a los turistas, lleva a los hoteles a los turistas y otras cosa más. Ya son 10 años que trabaja en la agencia y le ha ido muy bien. Antonio en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal desea comprar ropa para sus hijos y otras cosas mas.  

Antonio es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Antonio was born in the historic city of Cusco and is 42 years old. He currently lives in the same city where he was born, where the people are friendly and happy. He is a hardworking father who helps his three children to get ahead. He works in a travel agency, where he is in charge of picking up tourists, giving them information on the tours offered, bringing them to hotels, and other things. He has been working at the travel agency for 10 years already and it is going very well.

At this time, Antonio needs a loan for personal use. He would like to buy clothing for his children and some other things.

Antonio is a responsible person who belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Puntualito" communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy clothing for his children and some other things

loans.name: Exitosas De Boshindo Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama  "EXITOSAS DE  BOSHINDO"  porque las integrantes del grupo buscan el éxito cotidiano en su negocio dia con dia, buscando  una oportunidad  de tener más ventas y crecer. Están ubicadas en el Boshindo en Acambay en el Estado de México. El grupo está conformado por  9 integrantes y es la primera  vez que solicitan un prestamo. Maria Guadalupe O. es integrante del grupo. Tiene 47 años, estudió hasta la secundaria, es ama de casa y tiene 3 hijos hombres. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes y miselanea que inició hace 5 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar más mercancia de productos que le encargan, sus ventas son mixtas y tiene que invertir priemero para adquirir el producto. Sus clientes  son personas del mismo barrio, cada una prefiere comprar los productos con la señora, por la calidad  de los productos y la atención muy amable que tiene. Su carisma  es una de sus fortalezas por lo que sus clientes la recomiendan, eso ayuda a incrementar su mercado  y siga creciendo en clientes y ganancias. Al monento  de solicitar este  préstamo se siente feliz y con una motivacion por tener la oportunidad de invertir  nuevamente y poder distribuir más productos. Su negocio es tan importante  ya que con ello puede salir adelante con los gastos de su familia y mejoramineto de su hogar para obtener una mejor calidad de vida.  Observaciones. la señora que no se ve bien se llama Maria del Carmen.
texts.en:
This group is called ‘Existosas de Boshindo’ because the group members look to succeed daily in their businesses and look for opportunities for more sales and to grow. They are located in Boshindo in Acambay within the State of Mexico. The group is comprised of nine members and this is the first time they are requesting a loan.

Maria Guadalupe O. is one of the group members. She is 47 years old, completed up to high school, is a housewife, and has three sons. She works buying and selling groceries and miscellaneous items, a business which she started five years ago. She is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise, as her sales are mixed and she has to invest first to buy the product. Her customers are people from her same neighborhood and all of them prefer her products due to their quality and her friendly service. Her charisma is one of her strengths which is why her customers recommend her. This helps to expand her market and continue growing in terms of customers and profits. She feels happy and motivated from having requested the loan because she has the opportunity to invest again and is able to distribute more products. Her business is very important, as it is a means for her to cover the family expenses and housing improvements so that she can have a better quality of life.

Note: The woman who is difficult to see is named Maria del Carmen.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en: Wilfred is 37 years old, married and blessed with three children. He operates a cafe, a business he started three years ago. His cafe is located in the Kibera slums so most of his customers are low-income earners. He also works in the evening as a security guard so that he can make enough money to meet his family’s needs. Through Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business and hopes to expand it over the next five years. He has requested 40,000 Kes to buy ingredients such as beans, cooking fat and maize.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as beans, cooking fat and maize.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, D. 65 años, es una mujer directa, sincera y muy buena. Vive en su casa propia, junto a su  esposo Hildebrand que tiene 64 años y sus 2 hijos D. los 3 que tiene en total. Hace más D. 20 años, prepara y venD. tamales y en temporada D. invierno, caldo D. gallina y picarones, alimentos que son expendidos en una esquina un poco más lejos D. su casa, y desD. entonces le va bien. D. esta manera María se genera sus ingresos adicionales, y con estas ganancias mas tu ayuda,  podrá comprarse un televisor a colores para que sus clientes puedan distraerse mientras consumen los platillos que venD.. Asimismo compró una  refrigeradora y hasta el momento lo esta pagando en cuotas. Con mucha alegría realiza su negocio y se siente muy feliz por sus logros. Ahora se ha propuesto comprarse una lavadora, y está convencida, que con este crédito hará realidad su sueño. En adelante lo que mas desea es techar su casa D. material noble y, D. ese modo continuar construyendo otras habitaciones. Ingresa a su décimo crédito con MFP, y se compromete seguir siendo puntual en sus pagos, en agradecimiento D. tantas ayudas que ustedes le dieron. D. obtener el crédito que solicita, va comprarse su lavadora, para mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
María is 65 years old.  She is a very direct, sincere and good woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 64 year-old Hildebrand, and two of her three children.

For more than 20 years, Maria has been making and selling tamales.  In the winter she also makes chicken soup and 'picarones' (a type of doughnut) which are sold on a street corner not far from her home.  Her business has done well.  This is how Maria makes her additional income and with her profits, plus your help, she will be able to buy a color television set so that her customers can enjoy themselves while they are eating the dishes that she sells.  Maria also bought a refrigerator which she is paying for in installments.

Maria carries out her business with a lot of joy and she feels very happy with what she has accomplished.  She is now planning to buy a washing machine and she is convinced that, with this loan, she will see her dream fulfilled.  What she most wishes for in the future is to roof her house with good-quality construction materials and to continue building other rooms.

This is Maria's tenth loan from MFP and she pledges to continue making her loan repayments on time in recognition of the great help that you have given her in the past.  She will use her loan to buy herself a washing machine which will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine

loans.name: Christian

texts.es:
Christian nació en la ciudad de Paruro del departamento del Cusco y tiene 38 años de edad. Actualmente, Christian vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos casas y calles históricas donde antes vivieron los Incas, él es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a sus dos hijos, él trabaja en una agencia de viajes de turismo como guía de turismo. Ya son 15 años que trabaja en la agencia y le ha ido muy bien. Christian en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para abrir una tienda de abarrotes para que pueda a tender su esposa entonces compraran productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, aceite y otras cosas más.
   
Christian es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Christian is 38 years old and was born in the city of Paruro, located in the Department of Cusco. He lives in Cusco where there are beautiful historic houses and streets where the Inca used to live. He is a hardworking person who gets his two children ahead in life. He has worked for a travel agency as a tour guide for fifteen years and it has done very well.

Right now, Christian needs a loan to open a grocery store for his wife to manage. As a result, they will buy basic needs items like rice, sugar, pasta, milk, oil, and other items.

Christian is a responsible person who is a member of Puntualito Communal Bank, part of Cusco branch of Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy basic needs items like rice, sugar, pasta, milk, oil, etc.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 42 years old and a member of Favour Self Help Group under Faulu Kenya. She sells smoked and dried fish. Being a mother of six, she works hard in her business to help her husband with household expenses. She hopes to grow her business to generate more income. She has been guaranteed a loan of 30,000 Kes by her group members. With the loan, she will buy fish.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es: Zenaida de 42 años de edad, natural del distrito de Santa Rosa, convive con Mario de 48 años y fruto de ese amor concibieron 03 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa. Desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, Zenaida es campesina y cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de café, cacao, barbasco y hojas de coca; plantas oriundas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene trabajando 11 años en sus propias tierras, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de la mano de los jornaleros  quienes le ofrecen sus servicios en las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad es; no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café ya que cuenta con 01 hectárea de terreno no cultivado. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es muy querida por el resto de sus compañeros, ya que es muy solidaria con ellos. Con los 500 nuevos soles solicitados, contratará jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en las cosechas.
texts.en: Zenaida is 42 years old and a native of the District of Santa Rosa.  She lives with 48-year-old Mario with whom she has three children.  They live together in a house that they own.  As a young child, her parents taught her to work the farm.  Zenaida is a farmer and has four hectares of farmland where she grows coffee, cacao, barbasco (an inedible yam) and coca leaves, plants native to the jungle of the Apurimac River Valley.  She has worked on her own lands for eleven years and during the harvest, she hires workers to pick the fruits.  What she likes most about her work is the harvest, as she feels as though the months of hard work pay off with the quality of her fruits.  She considers the most difficult part to be transporting her products from the farm to the centers in the city of San Francisco where they pay her the best prices.  Another difficulty is not having enough income to pay the workers ahead of time for the help they provide during the harvests.  This is why she is turning to the loans provided by MFP.  However, planting more coffee plants is her priority at this point because she has an uncultivated hectare of land.  This is her eighth loan with MFP and she feels that this will help her greatly to progress in her work.  She is very well-liked by her fellow group members at her communal bank, as she is very supportive.  With the 500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will hire workers to provide support during the harvests.

loans.use: to hire workers to help her during the harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a pipe-fitting machine

loans.name: Jicayan Group

texts.es:
Grupo “Jícayan” llamado así porque todas las personas que integran este grupo son D. esta localidad que significa “lugar que produce jícaras (tazas)”, es una localidad habitada por indígenas mixteco, además que es una localidad que se dedica a la elaboración D. artesanías D. telares como enaguas y servilletas. Este grupo esta formado por 11 personas que se dedican a diferentes actividades Albina y Elena (elaboración D. enaguas), Rosa y Sofía (venta D. antojitos), Juana, María y Leonarda (venta D. abarrotes), Elvira, Gisela y Adela (elaboración D. servilletas) y Catalino (elaboración D. pizzas).
La representante D. este grupo es la señora Rosa H. M. quien esta casada con el señor Jacobo Hernández, tiene 2 hijos que estudian la primaria. Ella solicito el préstamo para poder comprar insumos como son maíz para las tortillas, carne, jitomate, chile y entre otros ya ella se dedica a la venta D. antojitos como son tacos dorados D. pollo, tacos D. res y enchiladas. Sus ventas las realiza en la primaria D. su localidad.
Otras D. las integrantes del grupo es la señora Juana Jiménez Gómez esta casada con el señor Rogelio H. quien se dedica al campo, tiene 3 hijos que estudian , Juana se dedica a la elaboración D. servilletas y naguas con la técnica D. telar en cintura una actividad que aprendió desD. muy joven ya que ha sido herencia D. sus antepasados, el cual le ah ayudado a sobresalir adelante con L. gastos D. su familia, ya es un actividad que es muy laboriosa pero el resultado es muy bonito ya que son artesanías reconocidas en la regio y que sirven D. vestimenta para muchas personas D. esta región. Ella comenta que le ah ido muy bien en sus ventas ya que ah vendido un poco mas desD. que solicitó el préstamo ya que este le ayudo para poder comprar mas materiales que necesita para su elaboración como son: mantas, hiL. D. colores, hiL. D. algodón, entre otros.
Su sueño mas anhelado es que sus hijos tengan una profesión para que le día D. mañana tengan mejores oportunidades.
Las personas que integran este grupo son muy humilD. y sencillas pero muy trabajadoras ellas están agradecida con las Fundacion por el apoyo que les brindan con el préstamo.
texts.en:
This group is called Jícayan because all of its members are from the village of Jícayan which means "place where jícaras (calabashes) are produced".  This is a village which is inhabited by Mixtec indigenous people.  It is a village whose inhabitants work making handicrafts on looms such as 'enaguas' (traditional skirts) and napkins.

This group has 11 members who all work in different businesses.  Albina and Elana make 'enaguas' (traditional skirts), Rosa and Sofia sell 'antojitos' (traditional Mexican snacks), Juana, Maria and Leonarda sell groceries, Elvira, Gisela and Adela make napkins and Catalino makes pizzas.

This group's representative is Rosa H. M. who is married to Jacobo Hernández and has two children who are attending elementary school.  She requested this loan so that she could buy supplies such as corn for making tortillas, meat, tomatoes, chilis, etc. since she sells snacks such as golden chicken tacos, beef tacos and enchiladas in the elementary school in her village.

Another of the group's members is Juana Jiménez Gómez who is married to Rogelio H., a farmer.  They have three children who are in school.  Juana's business is making napkins and traditional skirts using a backstrap loom.  This is an activity that she learned when she was very young since it was an inheritance from her ancestors.  It has helped her to cover her family expenses.  This is a very laborious task but the result is very beautiful and her handicrafts are recognized throughout the region.  Many people in this region wear these skirts.

Juana tells us that her sales have done very well and she has sold more products since she requested this loan.  The loan helped her to buy more materials that she needs to make her products such as blankets, colored threads, cotton threads, etc.  Her most important dream is for her children to have a profession so that they have better opportunities in life.

The members of this group are very humble and simple but also very hard working.  They are grateful to Fundación Realidad for the support that they have offered them with this loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making snacks

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: Maria Francisca H.: de 47 años tiene 5 hijos en edad escolar,ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la compra y venta de cafe maduro y seco por quintal,ella saca a vender su producto lo dias Jueves y domingos, madruga para aprovechar la mañana y asi poder vender su producto a buen precio y asi generar un poco mas de ganacia, ella alquila un camion para llevar su producto al mercado ya que donde ella vive esta un poco lejos. Aparte de eso de la compra de cafe tambien compra pepita de ayote por quintal. por eso ella solicita el credito para la compra de cafe Maduro y seco por quintal y compra de pepita de ayote por quintal,el sueño de ella es tener su propio vehiculo para transportarse con mas facilidad, y agrandar mas su capital para poder invertir un poco mas.
texts.en: María Francisca Hernández, 47, has five, school aged children.  She tells us that she sells raw and dry coffee by the quintal on Thursdays and Sundays.  She gets up at dawn to take advantage of the morning and sell her products at good prices to generate a bit more profit.  She leases a truck to take her products to market because she lives a bit far away.  Besides the coffee sales, she also buys quintals of pumpkin seeds.  She needs the loan to buy raw and dry coffee by the quintal and to buy quintals of pumpkin seeds.  Her dream is to own her own vehicle to get around more easily and to increase capital to be able to invest a bit more.

loans.use: to buy raw and dry coffee and pumpkin seeds.

loans.name: Prosperidad Group

texts.es:
L. A.C. “PROSPERIDAD” iniciará su decimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal D. Cascada.  Está compuesta por once integrantes y tiene como presidenta a L. señora Roset.   Los negocios D. las señoras son diferentes, entre ellos tenemos comercio, producción y servicio.

L. señora Roset, presidenta D. L. asociación comunal, indica que participa en Pro Mujer hace tres años y se integro a L. institución  por invitación D. lo promotores.

En L. actualidad L. señora Roset elabora trenzado D. mantas gracias a L. enseñanza D. su mamá, por eso viene trabajando en este rubro hace 6 años. El crédito que sacará ahora es para  L. compra D. teL. para mantas, las que adquirirá D. L. feria 16 D. julio. Posteriormente, las venderá en un puesto fijo que tiene en es mercado.

Esta forma D. trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, porque elL. vive en concubinato y tiene una niña.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta D. Pro Mujer, elL. responD. que le gusta L. capacitación.
texts.en:
The “PROSPERIDAD” communal bank will start its 10th cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Cascada Focal Center.  It has 11 members and its President is Roset.  The businesses of the members are different.  Among them we find: commerce, production and services.

Roset, group President, states that she’s participated in Pro Mujer for three years and became part of the institution through an invitation from the advisors.

Currently Roset is weaving blankets thanks to skills learned from her mother.  She’s been in this line of work for 6 years.  The loan she’s taking out now will be used to buy fabric for blankets that she’ll get at the 16 D. Julio market.  Later, she’ll sell them at a fixed stand she has at the market.

This work method allows her to generate income to support her family because she has a spouse and a daughter.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answers that she likes the training.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Sharoti

texts.en:
Sharoti is a married mother of 4 children living in Hoima, Uganda. Her family goal is to educate her children up to university.

For the past 8 years, Sharoti has been running a stationery shop, having left her teaching job to run the shop. She faces a challenge of the business being seasonal. In the future, she wants to make it a wholesale shop. Sharoti needs a loan to buy books, paper and pens to sell.

loans.use: to buy books, paper and pens to sell

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma nació en la ciudad de Lucre del departamento del Cusco y tiene 40 años de edad. Actualmente, Irma vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde la hay hermosos casas y calles históricas donde vivieron antes los Incas, ella es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a sus tres hijos, ella tiene una tienda donde vende jugos y también se realiza fotocopias y el negocio está ubicado en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que trabaja en el negocio y le ha ido muy bien. Irme en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para compara insumos como por ejemplo arroz,  azúcar y otras cosas. 

Irma es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Irma was born in the city of Lucre, Cusco Department.  She’s 40 years old and is currently living in the city of Cusco where there are beautiful houses and historic streets where the Incas used to live.  

She is a hard working person who is supporting her three children.  She has a store where she sells juices and also provides photocopying services; the business is located in her home.  She’s been in business several years and has done well.

On this occasion Irma needs the loan to buy ingredients like rice, sugar and others. 

Irma is a responsible person who is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Puntualito” (Right on Time) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice and sugar, among other things.

loans.name: Evans

texts.en:
Evans is 43 years old and married, with seven children in school. For the past six years, he has been selling secondhand clothes. He previously offered dry cleaning services.

Evans is also a church pastor; hence, he has employed one person to run his business in his absence. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Evans has learned how to save his money. He has also developed a lot of business skills through business trainings offered by Faulu Kenya. Evans hopes to grow his business to another level in the future. He has requested a loan of 25,000 KES to add more clothing to his stock.

loans.use: to add more clothing to his stock.

loans.name: Jesus Victor

texts.es:
Jesús nació en la ciudad de Pucartambo donde se celebra la fiesta de la Virgen del Carmen y la fiesta de la salida  del Sol en Tres Cruses de Oro, él tiene 29 años de edad es soltero y no tiene hijos aun. Actualmente, Jesús vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos casas, calles históricas y donde antes vivieron los Incas, él es una persona trabajadora que sale adelante y es guía de turismo, él trabaja en la agencia de viajes “MBA TOUR OPERADOR” desde a hace varios años y le va muy bien. Jesús en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar equipos de camping, carpas, utensilios y otras cosas más que el necesita. El sueño de Jesus es abrir una agencia de viajas de turismo.   

Jesús es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Jesús was born in the city of Pucarambo where the feast of the Virgen del Carmen is celebrated as well as the Rising of the Sun feast at Tres Cruces de Oro.  He is 29 years old and single; he has no children yet.

Jesús is currently living in the city of Cusco where there are beautiful houses and historic streets where the Incas used to live.  He is a very hard working person who gets ahead working as a Tourist Guide.  He has worked for the “MBA TOUR OPERADOR” tourist agency for several years and does very well.  On this occasion, Jesús needs the loan to buy camping equipment: tents, utensils and other things he needs.  His dream is to open his own travel agency.

Jesús is a responsible person who is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Puntualito” (Right on Time) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy camping equipment.

loans.name: Ramber

texts.es:
El señor Ramber O. M., tiene 22 años de edad, es una persona joven trabajador es soltero, vive con sus padres y les apoya a sus dos hermanas que estudian en el colegio, viven en la comunidad de sauces del municipio de mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba.
Trabaja junto a su padre en la agricultura, producen cebolla, zanahoria y frejol; y los venden en el mismo lugar.
Es una persona muy respetado en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el respozable del estudio de sus dos hermanas, 
Ramber, esta solicitando el presente credito para comprar mas semillas e insumos y aumentar mas superficie de sus cultivos y asi aumentar sus ingresos, apoyar mas a sus hermanas y mejorar la condicion de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Ramber O. M., 22, is a young, hard working, single man living with his parents; he helps them with expenses for his two sisters who are in school.  They live in the Sauces community in the municipality of Mizque in Cochabamba Department.

He works farming alongside his father; they grow onion, carrots and broad beans that they sell there as well.

He is a much respected person in his community because of his dedication to work ad for being responsible for the education of his two sisters.

Ramber is asking for this loan to buy more seed and farming supplies and to increase the surface of his plantations to increase his income, support his sisters more and improve the living condition of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es:
Estefanía de Jesús vive en el barrio los Calamares de la ciudad e Cartagena allí se dedica a la confección de ropa que financia a crédito. Una compañera apoyó a Estefanía para iniciarse en el mundo de la confección, pues ella le  enseñó el arte para que  dos años después se dedicara a hacer sus propios diseños y conseguir una abundante clientela,  aprovechando que tenia una maquina adquirida desde  el año 1976, en la que aun confecciona, porque ella dice que la puntada de esta antigua maquina es la mejor.  Como Estefanía es muy creativa hace poco incursionó en la fabricación de adornos en cerámica y también a eso le gana dinero; Este es su quinto financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y  su segundo credikiva, con él que comprará materiales e insumos como telas e hilos para confeccionar, aprovechando ahora que tiene muchos pedidos. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a sus financiadores:  “Agradezco la ayuda prestada y ojala sigan apoyando a los microempresarios que mucho lo necesitan.”
http://www.kiva.org/lend/187438
texts.en:
Estefanía de Jesús lives in Cartagena’s Calamares neighborhood where she manufactures clothes that she sells on credit.  A companion encouraged her to get into the dressmaking world teaching her the art so that two years later she was able to make her own designs and attain abundant clientele.  She took advantage of the fact that she had a sewing machine that she’d acquired in 1976, which she still uses, because she says that the stitch this old machine makes is still the best.  Because Estefanía is very creative, she recently went into making ceramic decorations and she makes money doing this as well.

This is her fifth loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and her second with Kiva.  She will use it to buy materials and supplies like, fabric and thread, to sew with taking advantage of the fact that she has many pending orders.

She sends the following message to lenders:  “I am grateful for the support provided.  I hope you will continue to support micro entrepreneurs that so need help.”


http://www.kiva.org/lend/187438

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis nació en la ciudad de Cusco donde se encuentra la ciudadela Inca de Machupicchu (Cusco, Perú), él tiene 48 años de edad,  tiene su pareja con quien cuatro hijos. Actualmente, Jose Luis vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos casas, calles históricas donde vivieron antes los Incas, él es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, él brinda servicio de transporte urbano, él tiene su propio carro y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro.  

José Luis es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
José Luis was born in the city of Cusco where the Inca citadel, Machupicchu, is found (Cusco, Perú).  He’s 48 years old and he and his spouse have four children.  He currently lives in Cusco where there are beautiful houses and historic streets where the Inca used to live.  He is a hard working person who supports his family providing public transportation services.  He owns his car and on this occasion needs a loan to service his car.

José Luis is a responsible person who is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Puntualito” (Right on Time) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce, who was born in 1957, is a single mother of one. She sells cereals to earn a living. She started the business in 2009 and has witnessed a lot of improvement since joining Faulu Kenya. Her business is located in the slums, with most buyers being low-income earners; however, she still manages to make a profit. Joyce also rents out semi-permanent houses for extra income. She hopes to build permanent rental houses in the future. Joyce will use this KES 20,000 loan to buy rice and beans.

loans.use: to buy rice and beans

loans.name: Vitaliano Teofilo

texts.es:
El sr. Vitaliano Teofilo Z., tiene 43 años de edad, les apoya a sus dos padres que viven con el, viven en la comunidad de san pedro del municipio de mizque del departamento de Cochabamba 

Trabaja en la agricultura, produce cebolla y  zanahoria, que los vende en el mismo lugar.
Vitaliano, es una persona responzable en su comunidad, por la dedicacion a su trabajo y por la atencion de sus queridos padres que viven con el ya muy viejitos.

El credito que ha solicitado los va invertir en la compra de mas semillas e insumos,   aumentar sus superficies de cultivos y aumentar su produccion y de esa forma tener mas ingresos y mejorar la condicion de vida de el y la de sus padres.
texts.en:
Mr. Vitaliano Teofilo Z., 43, supports his two parents who live with him in the community of San Pedro in Mizque municipality, Cochabamba Department.

He works farming onions and carrots which he sells there as well.  Vitalino is a responsible person in his community because of his dedication to his work and the care he provides his parents who live with him and are quite elderly.

He will use the requested loan to buy more seed and supplies, to increase his planted surface area and to increase production in order to have more income and improve the living conditions of himself and his parents.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: TO BUY COMPUTERS AND THEIR REPLACEMENT PARTS TO SELL

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam is a business-lady who sells second-hand clothes. She has been engaged in this business for three years. She also relies on her husband for financial support. She works hard in her business so as to help her husband in raising their eight children. She hopes to have a stable business within five years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 Kes to buy clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys nació en la ciudad de Mollepata en la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 40 años de edad, tiene su pareja con quien tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, Gladys vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos casas, calles históricas donde vivieron antes los Incas, ella es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella tiene un restaurante donde ofrece desayuno y almuerzo. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas Machupicchu (Cusco, Perú).

Gladys en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejempló arroz, azúcar, aceite, carne, verduras y otras cosas más que necesita para preparar la rica comida.  

Gladys es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Gladys was born in the city of Mollepata, Anta Province, Cusco Department.  She’s 40 years old and she and her spouse have four children.  Currently, Gladys lives in the city of Cusco where there are beautiful houses and historic streets where the Inca used to live.  She is a hard working person who supports her family with a restaurant she has where she offers breakfast and lunch.  She’s been in business for four years now and does very well.  The Inca citadel, Machupicchu, is found in Cusco (Cusco, Perú).

On this occasion Gladys needs the loan to buy supplies like: rice, sugar, oil, meat and vegetables and some other things she needs to prepare the delicious food.

Gladys is a responsible person who is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Puntualito” (Right on Time) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary was born in 1958. She is married and blessed with four children. She does tailoring in Kisii Village, which is a slum, hence most of the customers are low-income earners. She started operating the business three years ago with one employee. She hopes to makes clothes for wholesale in the future. She has requested a loan of 20,000 Kes to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a Ugandan man aged 40, who needs a loan to buy bicycle spare parts, salt, sugar and other groceries for resell in his retail shop. He hails from Kyenjojo, Uganda, and he is a father of six children. He lives in a semi-permanent house with 9 people that he takes care of and he dreams of acquiring land to set up a good livestock farm and educating his children. He acquired his initial capital from growing maize that he sold and he still faces a problem of unstable prices of products.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts, salt, sugar and other groceries for resale

loans.name: Mina Chojlla Group

texts.es:
La Asociación Comunal   ”MINA CHOJLLA”, está iniciando su noveno ciclo en el Centro Focal de Los Andes.  Esta asociación comunal cuenta con la participación de doce  integrantes.  La  mesa directiva tiene como presidenta a la señora Juana. 

Los negocios de las señoras son diferentes, entre ellos tenemos Tienda de barrio, venta de ají y verduras, zapatería, venta de ropa, venta de muebles, venta d comida, venta de frutas, trenzado de mantas.

La presidenta, la señora Juana es una mujer de 49 años es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Este es su quinto año que trabaja con asociaciones comunales,  desarrollando un negocio conjuntamente con su hija. 

En la actualidad vende comida y jugos en la zona Mina Chojlla, ella cuenta que, generalmente los ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas, los compra de la 16 de julio (zona comercial de El Alto); con el crédito que sacará comprara arroz, fideo y papa por mayor (porque es mas barato).

Cuando le consultamos qué es lo que más le gusta de Pro Mujer ella respondió que le gusta estar con las amigas, distraerse y pagar.
texts.en:
The “MINA CHOJLLA” communal bank is starting its 9th cycle in the Los Andes Focal Center.  This communal bank has 12 members.  Juana is the President of the governing board.

The members have different businesses.  Among them we have: neighborhood grocery store, chili and vegetable sales, shoe store, clothing sales, furniture sales, food sales, fruit sales and blanket weaving.

The President, Juana, is a 49 year old woman.  She’s married and has five children.  This is her fifth year of working with communal banks running a business with her daughter.

She sells juices and food in the Mina Chojlla area.  She relates that she usually buys her ingredients at the 16 de Julio market (El Alto’s commercial zone).  She will use the loan to buy rice, noodles and potatoes at wholesale (because it’s less expensive).

When we asked her what she liked best about Pro Mujer she answered that she likes being with her friends, to relax and to pay.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles and potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Aldama Group

texts.es: Este grupos solidario se llama Aldama se encuentra localizado en la comunidad de Jantetelco, en el estado de Morelos, México, está conformado por 5 mujeres que se conocen y son vecinas ellas son la señora Maricela va a comprar con su crédito blusas, pantalones, camisas etc. Para su venta, las señoras Ana María, Irma y Francisca van a comprar productos de belleza por catalogo para vender, la señora Lucia va a comprar tortillas, chicharrones, cueritos, queso, crema y verduras para la elaboración de la comida para vender sus antojitos, La señora Lucia es integrante del grupo, ella tiene 46 años de edad, estudio la primaria hasta el 6º. Año  y la secundaria la estudio en el INEA obteniendo su certificado, ella vive en unión libre con su esposo que trabaja en el campo tienen 2 hijos Miguel Ángel tiene 22 años de edad y trabaja, Ana Miriam tiene 16 años de edad está estudiando Bachilleres, la señora lucia tiene su negocio de venta de comida, ella solicito su crédito para comprar carnes, tortilla, teleras, chicharrones, cueritos, queso, crema y verduras para elaborar la comida y preparar los antojitos, su negocio esta frente al Balnearia Acuario en Jantetelco en su casa, ella ofrece a sus clientes tortas, chicharrones preparados, tostadas, dobladas, dulces, coctel de frutas. La señora Lucia inicio su negocio hace 20 años con un préstamo que le proporcionaron y lo invirtió en mercancía, ella aprendió de su mama vendía comida y le ayudaba a su mama a preparar los alimentos de ahí aprendió, su negocio es importante porque de ahí saca para pagar el préstamo, para comer y para su hija para lo que necesite en la escuela, ella está orgullosa de su negocio porque le gusta preparar los alimentos que su mama le enseño y cuando hay buenas ventas, las ganancias la va ahorrando en banco azteca para algún imprevisto o alguna enfermedad, ella está planeando comprar dulces para que su negocio crezca y lo piensa lograr con el préstamo que le van a dar, sus planes y esperanzas son salir adelante trabajando, que su hija siga estudiando. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “gracias por apoyarnos con el préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, pagando bien para que nos presten otro, les agradecemos de antemano su ayuda. Jantetelco es un pueblo bonito donde elaboran el dulce cristalizado como es el jamoncillo, camote, chilacayote, camote, higo, biznaga, también siembran el camote, maíz, frijol, sorgo, pepino y jitomate de vivero.
texts.en: This group is called Aldama and is located in the community of Jantetelco, in the state of Morelos, Mexico. It has 5 women members who are neighbours and know each other. Maricela is going to buy blouses, trousers, shirts etc. with her loan. For their business, Ana María, Irma and Francisca are going to buy catalogue beauty products to sell, and Lucía will buy tortillas, chicharrones (pork scratchings), cueritos (marinated pork rind), cheese, cream and vegetables for preparing food and selling snacks. Lucía is a member of the group and is 46 years old. She attended primary school until the 6th year and achieved her secondary education certificate in the INEA. She lives with her common law husband who works in the fields, and they have 2 children: Miguel Ángel is 22 years old and works, while Ana Miriam is 16 years old and is studying for her Bachilleres (high school qualification). Lucía runs a food business, and requested her loan in order to buy meat, tortillas, teleras (crusty bread rolls), pork scratchings, marinated pork skins, cheese, cream and vegetables with which to prepare snacks. Her business is opposite the 'Acuario' spa in Jantetelco and from her home she offers her customers tortas (crusty sandwich rolls), prepared pork scratchings, tostadas (topped crispy tortillas), dobladas (folded and stuffed tortillas), sweets and fruit cocktail. LucÍa started her business 20 years ago with a loan provided to her, which she invested in stock. She learnt from her mother who used to sell food, and she used to help her prepare it. Her business is important because it allows her to pay the loan back, eat and provide what her daughter needs for school. She is proud of her business and enjoys preparing the food her mother taught her. When her sales are up, she saves the profits in Banco Azteca for emergencies or illness. She is planning to buy sweets to expand her business and she is hoping to do so with this loan. Her plans and hopes are to move forward through her work, and that her daughter continues studying. Group members would like to give Kiva and the Fundación Realidad the following message: "thank you for supporting us with this loan to invest in our business. We will pay it back so that we can receive another, and we thank you in advance for your help". Jantetelco is a pretty town where they make crystallized sweets like jamoncillo, sweet potato, chilacayote squash, fig and bishop's weed. They also grow sweet potato, maize, beans, sorghum, cucumber and nursery tomatoes.

loans.use: to buy meat, tortillas, chicharrones (pork scratchings), cueritos (marinated pork rind), cheese, cream and vegetables for preparing food to sell

loans.name: Julyssa

texts.es:
Julyssa nació en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 35 años de edad y tiene su pareja con quien todavía no tienen hijos. Actualmente, Julyssa vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos casas, donde sitios históricas y  donde vivieron antes los Incas, ella es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella tiene una botica que se llama Sr. de Los Temblores. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En la ciudad del  Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas de Machupicchu (Cusco, Perú),

Julyssa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar medicamentos que faltan en el negocio. El sueño de la socia Julyssa es abrir otra botica en la ciudad del Cusco.   

Julyssa es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Julyssa was born in the city of Cusco; she’s 35 years old.  She and her spouse don’t have children yet.  Currently, Julyssa is living in the city of Cusco where there are beautiful houses and historic sites where the Inca used to live.  She’s a hard working person who supports her family.  She has a drug store called "Señor de los Temblores."  She’s been in business for three years now and she does very well.  Machupicchu, the Inca citadel, is found In the city of Cusco (Cusco, Perú).

On this occasion, Julyssa needs the loan to buy medicine she needs for her business.  Julyssa’s dream is to open another drug store in the city of Cusco.

Julyssa is a responsible person who is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Puntualito” (Right on Time) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Barrack

texts.en: Barrack is 50 years old, married, and has four children. He runs a grocery and a retail shop to earn a living. It's six years since he started the business. Through Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save his money. He hopes to add business stock so as to earn more income. He has requested a loan of 20,000 Kes to buy vegetables, tomatoes and fruits.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, tomatoes and fruits

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha nació en la ciudad de Combapata de la provincia de Canchis departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 38 años de edad y vive en la ciudad del Cusco donde hay hermosos paisajes, donde hay sitios históricas y  donde hay centros arqueológicos de los antiguos pobladores del imperio Inca. 

Martha es una persona trabajadora que tiene su tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde vende sus productos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otros alimentos de primera necesidad. Martha en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo leche, atún, gaseosa, cerveza y otras cosa que faltan en el negocio. 

Martha es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. En la ciudad del  Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas de Machupicchu (Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Martha was born in the city of Combapata, in the province of Canchis, department of Cusco. She is 38 years old and lives in the city of Cusco, where there are beautiful landscapes, historic sites and archaeological centers of the ancient inhabitants of the Inca empire. 

Martha is a hard-working person who has a grocery store in her home. She sells products such as rice, sugar, noodles and other basic foods. At this time, Martha needs a loan to buy merchandise such as milk, tuna, soft drinks, beer, and other items which are lacking in her store.

Martha is a responsible person who belongs to the “Puntualito” ["On-Time"] communal bank of the Arariwa Association in the city of Cusco, Peru. In the city of Cusco, the settlement of the Incas of Machu Picchu is found (Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as milk, tuna, soft drinks, beer and other items that are lacking in her store

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, 35, is the mother of five children. She is married to a businessman from Kyenjojo, Uganda. 

She needs a loan to buy maize for resale. She dreams of building a permanent house for her family, educating her children and increasing her sources of income by starting other businesses despite challenges in price fluctuations.

She acquired her initial capital from growing maize that she sold off.

loans.use: to buy maize for resale

loans.name: Hilda Marisella

texts.es: Hilda Marisella P.: es una señorita de 25 años de edad es soltera y nos cuenta que desde muy pequeña empeso a trabajar ahora cuenta con un negocio propio desde hace años, ella solicita este credito para la compra de cosmeticos en bariedad y al mismo tiempo agrandar mas su negocio ya que para la semana santa empieza la buena venta ella quiere comprar,bolsas,carteras para dama,cosmeticos y joyeria,ella confia en que fape le dara la oportunidad de superarse ya que hasta la fecha ella se a esforsado sola para superarse el sueño de ella es seguir estudiando y espera lograrlo con el apoyo que fape le pueda brindar para poder trabajar en el dia y estudiar en la noche.
texts.en: Hilda Marisella P. is a 25 year old young woman. She is single and tells us that since she was very little she has worked. Now she has had her own business for some years. She is asking for this loan to buy a variety of cosmetics and at the same time enlarge her business, since during Holy Week sales are good. She wants to buy women's bags and wallets, cosmetics and jewelry. She trusts that Fape will give her the chance to get ahead since so far she has worked alone to get ahead. Her dream is to keep going to school and she hopes to attain this with the support that Fape can give her to be able to work during the day and study at night.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cosmetics and to buy gold jewelry

loans.name: Nueva Semilla Group

texts.es:
La Asociación Comunal   ”NUEVA SEMILLA”, está iniciando su segundo ciclo en el Centro Focal de Los Andes.  Esta asociación comunal cuenta con la participación de ocho  integrantes.  La  mesa directiva tiene como presidenta a la señora Adela. 

Los negocios de las señoras son diferentes, entre ellos tenemos Tienda de barrio, macramé, costura, venta de frutas, taller de tejido de mantas y chalinas, venta de chuño, venta de verduras, repostería.

La presidenta, la señora Adela es una mujer de 40 años es soltera y tiene una hija. Este es su segundo año que trabaja con asociaciones comunales,  desarrollando un negocio sola. 

En la actualidad comercializa frutas, las que compra de la zona de El Tejar (de los carros); con el crédito que sacará pretende iniciar un negocio de tejido, los que venderá los días viernes en la ex tranca de 8:00 a 15:00..

Cuando le consultamos qué es lo que más le gusta de Pro Mujer ella respondió que le gusta la capacitación.
texts.en:
The  ”NUEVA SEMILLA” [New Seed] Communal Association is in its second cycle in the Regional Office of the Andes. This community association has the participation of eight members. The board of directors has Adela as president. 

The women's business' are different. Among them are: neighborhood store, macramé, sewing, fruit selling, a blanket and shawl weaving workshop, selling potato flour, selling vegetables, and pastries.  

The president, Adela, is a 40 year old woman. She is single and has a daughter. This is her second year working with community associations, developing a business by herself. 

At present, she sells fruit. She buys them in the area of El Tejar (from the trucks); with the loan she will take out, she plans on starting a weaving business. She will sell her product on Fridays at Extranca from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

When we asked her what she likes the most about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes the trainings.

loans.use: to buy weaving materials

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma nació en el departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 54 años de edad y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. En la ciudad del Cusco hay hermosos paisajes, donde hay sitios históricos y donde hay centros arqueológicos de los antiguos pobladores del imperio Inca. 

Vilma es una persona trabajadora que tiene su propio horno donde prepara ricos panes y otras cosas. Ya son 10 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Vilma en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar harina para preparar ricos panes. 

Vilma es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. En la ciudad del  Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas de Machupicchu, Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Vilma was born in the Cusco department.  She is 54 years old, and she lives in the same city she was born in.  The city of Cusco has beautiful scenery, historic sites, and the ancient archeology of the inhabitants of the Incan empire. 

Vilma is a hard-working person who has her own oven.  She prepares delicious breads and other baked goods.  She has had this business for ten years.  It is going very well for her thanks to effort she puts into her work.  Vilma now needs a loan to buy flour to make delicious breads.

Vilma is a responsible person who belongs to the Puntualito Communal Bank of the Arariwa Aociación in the city of Cusco, Perú.  The city of Cusco is where the Inca citadel, Machupicchu, is found (Cusco, Perú).

loans.use: to buy flour to make delicious breads

loans.name: Emma Rina

texts.es:
Emma Rina nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 51 años de edad y vive en la  ciudad del Cusco. En la ciudad del Cusco hay hermosos paisajes, donde hay sitios históricos y donde hay centros arqueológicos de los antiguos pobladores del imperio Inca. 

Emma Rina es profesora pero ahora esta jubilada  pero no por ese motivo ella dejo de trabajar, ella tiene un pequeño negocio de hacer manualidades, ella hace tejidos con lana y hace tras cosa más. Emma Rina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para el gasto de la educación de sus hijos. Emma Rina tiene un sueño y es de abrir un taller de tejido donde pueda hacer bonitas manualidades. 
  
Emma Rina es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. En la ciudad del  Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas de Machupicchu, Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Emma Rina was born in the city of Paucartambo in the Cusco department.  She is 51 years old and lives in the city of Cusco.  In Cusco, there are beautiful landscapes, where there are historical sites and archeological centers of the ancient settlements of the Inca empire.

Emma Rina is a teacher, but although she is retired now, she hasn't stopped working.  She has a small business making handcrafts.  She makes knitted items with wool and also makes other items.  Right now, Emma Rina needs the loan to pay for the education of her children.  Emma Rina has a dream, and it is to open a knitting workshop where she can make beautiful handcrafts.

Emma Rina is a responsible person who belongs to the "Puntualito" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa of Cusco, Peru.  The Incan citadel of Machupicchu, Cusco, Peru is located in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to pay for the education for her children

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a father of three children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He longs to educate his children up to university. 

He owns a bicycle spare parts shop that he has operated for four years. The current price fluctuations are affecting his business and he desires some day to trade in motorcycle and car spare parts. 

He acquired his initial capital from growing maize and ground nuts that he sold off. 

John wants a loan to buy bicycle spare parts for resale.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts for resale

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto nació en la ciudad de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, él tiene 44 años de edad y vive en la misma ciudad  donde nació junto con sus seis hijos. En la ciudad del Cusco hay hermosos paisajes, donde hay sitios históricos y donde hay centros arqueológicos de los antiguos pobladores del imperio Inca. 

Alberto tiene una pequeña agencia de viajes “Urcupiña Tours” donde ofrece a los turistas nacionales y extranjeros paquetes turísticos al Valle Sagrado de los Incas, Valle del Sur del Cusco, Machupicchu y otros tours. Ya son tres  años que se dedica a la agencia de viajes y le va muy bien gracia al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Alberto requiere el crédito para comprar útiles escolares para sus hijos 
  
Alberto es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Puntualito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. En la ciudad del  Cusco se encuentra la ciudadela de los Incas de Machupicchu, Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Alberto was born in the city of Cusco in the department of Cusco. He is 44 years old and lives with his six children in the same city where he was born. In they city of Cusco there are beautiful landscapes where there are historical sites and archaeological sites of the ancient peoples of the Incan empire.

Alberto has a small travel agency “Urcupiña Tours” where he offers tourist packages to the Sacred Valley of the Incans, the Valley of the South of Cusco, Machupicchu and other tours to national and foreign tourists. He has been working at the travel agency for the three years and it has been going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. At this time Alberto needs a loan to buy school supplies for his children.
  
Alberto is a very responsible person who belongs to the communal bank “Puntualito” of the Asociación Arariwa of the city of Cusco, Perú. In the city of Cusco you will find the fortress of the Incans of Machupicchu, Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for his children.

loans.name: Triunfadoras Del Santuario Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “TRIUNFADORAS DEL SANTUARIO” iniciará el primer ciclo en el Centro Focal de Panamericana.  Está compuesta por catorce integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva, a la cabeza de la señora Julia.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: costura de chalecos, venta de refrescos, venta de lana de vicuña, venta de comida, tienda de abarrotes, venta de verduras, tejido de mantas, construcción, venta de ropa, venta de camas y ollas de presión, venta de edredones, venta de coca.
 
La señora Julia tiene como negocio la venta comida, para la compra de sus ingredientes se dirige a la feria de Extranca de Rio Seco y lo vende en la ex parada 8 (ambos lugares en la ciudad de El Alto); con el crédito que sacará pretende ampliar su negocio.

En la actualidad la señora tiene treinta y nueve años, es casada y tiene una hija, la que le ayuda todos los días en su negocio.

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el aprender y la organización.
texts.en:
The “TRIUNFADORAS DEL SANTUARIO” communal bank will start its first cycle with the Panamericana Focal Center.  It has 14 members and led by a governing board chaired by Julia.

The businesses the members carry out are varied.  Among them are: vest making, sale of soft drinks, Vicuña wool sales, food sales, grocery store, vegetable sales, blanket weaving, construction, clothing sales, sale of beds and pressure cookers, comforter sales and coca leaf sales.

Julia’s business is selling fast food.  To buy her ingredients she goes to the Extranca de Rio Seco market and she does her sales at the #8 Ex-Stop (both places in the city of El Alto).  She will use the loan to expand her business.

She is 39 years old, married and has a daughter who helps her in the business every day.

When she’s asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answers that she likes to learn and the organization.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Paceñitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PACEÑITAS” iniciará su decimo quinto  ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y tiene como presidenta a la señora Marina.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de ropa, venta de relojes, venta de comida.

La señora Marina, presidenta de la asociación comunal, indica que es su cuarto año con  Pro Mujer y que ingreso por que le trajeron sus amigas

En la actualidad la señora Marina tiene un negocio de venta de comida que trabaja hace diez años, nos cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió sola. El crédito que sacará ahora es para la compra de material de construcción para su casa.

Para la elaboración de la comida compra los ingredientes de la Ceja (zona de comercio de la ciudad de El Alto) y lo comercializa en la zona Ballivian los días jueves y domingo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta compartir con sus compañeras y el pago mensual.
texts.en:
The “PACEÑITAS” community bank is about to start its 15th loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Alto Lima regional office.  This group has eight members and its president is Marina.  The businesses that the members of this group carry out are varied and include: selling clothes, selling watches and selling meals.

Marina, the bank's president, tells us that this is her fourth year with Pro Mujer and that she joined through her friends.

Marina currently has a business selling meals which she has owned for ten years.  She tells us that she learned the business herself.  She will use this loan to buy construction supplies for her home.

Marina buys the ingredients for making her meals in La Ceja (a commercial area in the city of El Alto) and she sells her meals in Ballivian neighborhood on Thursdays and Sundays.  This work allows her to make money with which to support her family.  She is married and has three children.

When we asked Marina what she likes about Pro Mujer she replied that she enjoys sharing with her fellow groups members and the monthly payment.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for her home

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Angel nació en la provincia de Canchis del departamento del Cusco, él tiene 50 años de edad y vive en la ciudad del Cusco junto con sus dos hijos. En la ciudad del Cusco hay hermosos paisajes, donde hay sitios históricos y donde hay centros arqueológicos de los antiguos pobladores del imperio Inca. 

Miguel Angel es docente y trabaja en el colegio de la comunidad de Huallachoca de la provincia de Anta y también se dedica a la distribución de comestibles, galletas, dulces y muchas cosas más, a las tiendas escolares y tiendas de abarrotes en la ciudad del Cusco.
